definitions.definition: grind or crush (something) in a mill.
examples: hard wheats are easily milled into white flour
synonyms: triturate "the wheat is milled into flour"

definitions.definition: cut or shape (metal) with a rotating tool.
produce regular ribbed markings on the edge of (a coin) as a protection against illegal clipping.
(of people or animals) move around in a confused mass.
examples: people milled about the room, shaking hands
synonyms: crowd "people were milling about in the streets"

definitions.definition: thicken (wool or another animal fiber) by fulling it.
